rukus.text: wa-ila thamuda akhahum salihan qala yaqawmi uʿ'budu l-laha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhu huwa ansha-akum mina l-ardi wa-is'taʿmarakum fiha fa-is'taghfiruhu thumma tubu ilayhi inna rabbi qaribun mujibun
qalu yasalihu qad kunta fina marjuwwan qabla hadha atanhana an naʿbuda ma yaʿbudu abauna wa-innana lafi shakkin mimma tadʿuna ilayhi muribin
qala yaqawmi ara-aytum in kuntu ʿala bayyinatin min rabbi waatani min'hu rahmatan faman yansuruni mina l-lahi in ʿasaytuhu fama tazidunani ghayra takhsirin
wayaqawmi hadhihi naqatu l-lahi lakum ayatan fadharuha takul fi ardi l-lahi wala tamassuha bisuin fayakhudhakum ʿadhabun qaribun
faʿaqaruha faqala tamattaʿu fi darikum thalathata ayyamin dhalika waʿdun ghayru makdhubin
falamma jaa amruna najjayna salihan wa-alladhina amanu maʿahu birahmatin minna wamin khiz'yi yawmi-idhin inna rabbaka huwa l-qawiyu l-ʿazizu
wa-akhadha alladhina zalamu l-sayhatu fa-asbahu fi diyarihim jathimina
ka-an lam yaghnaw fiha ala inna thamuda kafaru rabbahum ala buʿ'dan lithamuda
